entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stewart Airport 02:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
